name: Silvers Rayleigh
text: [On Play] Choose up to two of your opponent's Characters. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, give one Character -3000 power and the other -2000 power. After this, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a power of 3000 or lower.

effect.text: Choose up to two of your opponent's Characters. Until the end of your opponent's next turn, give one Character -3000 power and the other -2000 power. After this, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a power of 3000 or lower.

meta.notes: Implements sequential On Play: two debuffs lasting until opponent's next turn, then optional KO of a 3000 power or less Character.
